title: Errors on the price of RP skins on my account
body:
Hi, my account name is YYID.
I opened my "your shop" 
And it said that Warlord Shen was originally 1765, which is not, and for Butcher Olaf, it said it was originally 1540 which is not true. I feel bad on this mistake because if i have bought those two, then I could've wasted my money.
Please don't make any mistakes like me not only for me, but for everyone else.
Go into my account and check it. Thank you.

replies.body: Yeeeeaaaaa none of those skins cost that much originally. I'm guessing that you don't own Shen or Olaf yet, and those prices are the reduced price of the skin + the price of the champion. If you buy one of those, it will unlock the champion and skin at once.
Still need help with my issue and my ticket. Its been 2 days and I really need this rp b4 the sales are gone. https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/skLcj08P-broporo

No worries just yet! I see your ticket, but it looks like the billing team is just a liiiiiiiittle bit backed up at the moment. I'm going to have someone grab your ticket shortly, but in the meantime make sure that you're entering the entire code in the pre-paid card section **including the REP-US part**. 

If that's not working still, we should be able to get it cleared up in your ticket, but you can also contact amazon in the meantime to see if they can get the code fixed too! I like to give as many options as possible ^_^!

https://i.gyazo.com/8e4026bc206f219a9305d20e2de9ff87.png
Freaking thanks man! I got the RP!
